"Atom" commonly refers to the Atom Syndication Format (the RSS  
alternative) http://www.atomenabled.org/developers/syndication/atom- 
format-spec.php
"APP" is the "Atom Publishing Protocol" (the REST API), http:// 
www.atomenabled.org/developers/syndication/atom-format-spec.php

Stefan
